meanings.definition: A type of leafy green vegetable commonly used in salads.
meanings.sent1: I added some fresh arugolas to my salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: The arugolas in the salad added a peppery taste.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and stole all the arugolas for its own salad.
meanings.sent4: The arugolas danced in the bowl, adding a vibrant touch to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The bright green arugolas looked like miniature umbrellas in the salad bowl.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'arugola'.
meanings.sent1: I bought a bunch of arugolas to make a big salad for the party.
meanings.sent2: The arugolas were fresh and crisp, perfect for a summer salad.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen was overflowing with arugolas, making it look like a vegetable jungle.
meanings.sent4: The arugolas piled up high in the basket, ready to be washed and eaten.
meanings.sent5: The market stall was full of colorful arugolas, enticing customers with their freshness.
